title: Promotion Series Free Win?
body: Just got back into promos to plat after losing them a few days ago. Just wondering if i'm supposed to get a free win or not?

replies.body: Congrats on your prowess so far.  Per the promo helper section of our [ranked play ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h2)guide, promo helper deactivates past Gold I.  In this case, that feature won't be available for you.  Let me know if that clears things up, and good luck!
